query: mera to mobile internet hi nahin chal raha hai.
response: Oh no! Mobile internet na chalna thoda frustrating hota hai. Pehle check karo ki mobile data on hai ya nahi. Agar on hai, toh phone ko restart karke dekho. Agar phir bhi nahi chal raha, toh kisi badae ko batao, shayad unki madad se theek ho jaye!
